name: Multi-Repo Dev Container
postCreateCommand:
mkdir -p /workspaces/scripts && mkdir -p /workspaces/.devcontainer && mkdir -p $HOME/.local/bin && touch /workspaces/.repos_config && cat > /workspaces/scripts/setup_repos.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash

LOG_FILE="/workspaces/.repos_setup_log"
ENV_VARS_FILE="/workspaces/.devcontainer/env_vars.sh"

log() {
  echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $1" >> "$LOG_FILE"
}

IFS=' ' read -r -a repos <<< "${REPOS_TO_CLONE:-}"
IFS=' ' read -r -a env_vars <<< "${ENV_VARS_TO_SET:-}"

clone_repo() {
  local repo_name=$1

  if [ -d "/workspaces/$repo_name" ]; then
    echo "âœ… Repositorio $repo_name ya existe."
    return 0
  fi

  echo -n "ðŸ”— Ingrese la URL para clonar $repo_name: "
  read repo_url

  if [ -z "$repo_url" ]; then
    echo "âŒ No se proporcionÃ³ URL. Saltando $repo_name."
    return 1
  fi

  echo "â³ Clonando $repo_name desde $repo_url..."
  cd /workspaces && git clone "$repo_url" "$repo_name"

  if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "âœ… Repositorio $repo_name clonado exitosamente."
    return 0
  else
    echo "âŒ Error al clonar $repo_name. IntÃ©ntelo de nuevo."
    return 1
  fi
}

ask_env_vars() {
  echo "\nðŸ” CONFIGURACIÃ“N DE VARIABLES DE ENTORNO ðŸ”"
  echo "=========================================="
  touch "$ENV_VARS_FILE"

  for var in "${env_vars[@]}"; do
    if [ -z "${!var}" ]; then
      echo -n "ðŸ’¬ Ingrese el valor para \"$var\": "
      read value
      echo "export $var=\"$value\"" >> "$ENV_VARS_FILE"
    fi
  done
}

main() {
  echo "\nðŸ“¦ CONFIGURACIÃ“N DE REPOSITORIOS ðŸ“¦"
  echo "=====================================\n"

  if [ ${#repos[@]} -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "âš ï¸  No se proporcionaron repositorios en la variable REPOS_TO_CLONE."
    log "ERROR: No se proporcionaron repositorios."
    return 1
  fi

  local all_cloned=true

  for repo_name in "${repos[@]}"; do
    clone_repo "$repo_name"
    if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
      all_cloned=false
    fi
  done

  if [ "$all_cloned" = true ]; then
    echo -e "\nðŸŽ‰ Â¡Todos los repositorios han sido configurados correctamente! ðŸŽ‰"
    log "SUCCESS: Repos configurados correctamente por $(whoami)"
    ask_env_vars
    touch /workspaces/.repos_setup_complete
    return 0
  else
    echo -e "\nâš ï¸  Algunos repositorios no pudieron ser configurados. Ejecute el script nuevamente."
    log "WARNING: FallÃ³ la configuraciÃ³n completa por $(whoami)"
    return 1
  fi
}

main
EOF

chmod +x /workspaces/scripts/setup_repos.sh && ln -sf /workspaces/scripts/setup_repos.sh $HOME/.local/bin/SetUpDevContainer && echo '
# Mensaje recordatorio para configurar repos y cargar variables
if [ -f /workspaces/.devcontainer/env_vars.sh ]; then
  source /workspaces/.devcontainer/env_vars.sh
fi

if [ ! -f /workspaces/.repos_setup_complete ]; then
  echo "\nðŸ’¡ Tip: ejecuta \"SetUpDevContainer\" para configurar tus repositorios y variables de entorno.\n"
fi' >> ~/.zshrc
